thread.title: DHS Adds Houston, Chicago to DNDO Program
thread.title_full: DHS Adds Houston, Chicago to DNDO Program

title: DHS Adds Houston, Chicago to DNDO Program
text:
15 DHS Adds Houston, Chicago to DNDO Program 
AFCEA Signal: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) added two cities to its Domestic Nuclear Detection Office’s (DNDO) Securing the Cities program, an effort to increase the nation’s capabilities to detect and protect against radiological and nuclear threats. Officials on Monday announced the addition of Houston and Chicago to the program.
